AssignedCastDescription: With this we can support dropping an additional Mech onto the battlefield.

Description.Details: Enables to Drop 1 additional Mech. Requires Command Console Upgrades to Control! So it turns out the docking cradles were salvaged for parts and scrap, but the mounting points are still intact. I can get my techs to work fabricating new 'Mech cradles commander, but it's gonna take a while to get everything rebuilt. I think there's enough pieces left behind to get one assembled quickly, though.
Description.Name: Repaired Mechbay
